name: ndl-isil-json
description: convert ndl isil-lod RDF/XML into JSON

scripts.jsonld: node bin/jsonld.js .cache/*.rdf > dist/ndl-isil.json && node bin/minify.js dist/ndl-isil.json > dist/ndl-isil.min.json
scripts.geojson: node bin/geojson.js dist/ndl-isil.json > dist/ndl-isil.geojson && node bin/minify.js dist/ndl-isil.geojson > dist/ndl-isil.min.geojson
scripts.build: npm run setup; npm run jsonld; npm run geojson;npm run schema
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build;mkdir -p public;cp -t public dist/* README.md;jsonschema2md -d dist -o public/docs

author: frogcat
